Package main

Class UI

java.lang.Object
main.UI
public class UI extends Object
UI class that takes care of UI part of this game.
Author:
Hayato, Connor, Rose, Joshua

    Draws the instruction screen when the game is running
    void
    drawLoseScreen()
    If the main character's health becomes 0, the game will end immediately and a lose screen shows up showing options to retry or to quit

    draws the text "Pause" when user clicks p

    Draws the battery health bar in the top right corner and will change based on the main character's health

    When the game is booted up, the main screen is drawn with the title of the game and a picture of the main character There is menu functionality to cycle between the options which are to start the game and to quit

    • drawPlayerLife

      public void drawPlayerLife()
      Draws the battery health bar in the top right corner and will change based on the main character's health

    • drawLoseScreen

      public void drawLoseScreen()
      If the main character's health becomes 0, the game will end immediately and a lose screen shows up showing options to retry or to quit

    • drawWinScreen

      public void drawWinScreen()
      draws win screen when player reaches the door (win)

    • drawPauseScreen

      public void drawPauseScreen()
      draws the text "Pause" when user clicks p

    • drawTitleScreen

      public void drawTitleScreen()
      When the game is booted up, the main screen is drawn with the title of the game and a picture of the main character There is menu functionality to cycle between the options which are to start the game and to quit

    • drawInstructionsScreen

      public void drawInstructionsScreen()
      Draws the instruction screen when the game is running

    • getXForCenteredText

      public int getXForCenteredText(String text)
      gets the x coordinate of the text "Pause"
      Parameters:
      text - The given text that will be written
      Returns:
      int (x coordinate of the text) where the text will be centered
